body: Make sense. I swear nhentai was one of the best in content specially because of the magic numbers people share, i rarely get a source code from hitomi or ehentai

They never were the best website with up to date content. It's just a scrapper taking doujins from ehentai (where I uploaded the translated chapters.) I guess some bug in the system kept them from scrapping chapters 4 and 5.

@Patters53 I posted my comment a day after reading all 5 chapters translated on hitomi.la ¬¬
nhentai still have the untranslated chap 5 and missing chap 4... when did they stop being one of the best websites with up to date content?
